name: Ws16-ex1
body:
# Students Grades Web Service API. This web application created to give details about Shenkar students.
All the requests should be in GET method.
The students details returned in JSON objects.
### Show All Students Details: https://targil1.herokuapp.com/getAllStudent JSON response examples:
[ { _id: "572c321bb3f30a0752a5e2ef", ID: 1, firstName: "John", lastName: "Doe", grade: 95, year: 2000 } ] ### Show Grade By Specific ID: https://targil1.herokuapp.com/getStudGradeById/xxx Parameters:
xxx - the id of the specific student

Throws:
error - if ID does not exist in the database.

Header:
header getStudGradeById - if ID does not exist in the database.
JSON response examples:
{ gradeById: 95 } ### Show students in range of grades: https://targil1.herokuapp.com/betweengrade?from=80&to=90 Parameters:
from - Specify the beginning of the grade range
to - Specify the end of the grade range

Throws:
error - if there isn't grades in the range that you specified

Header:
header betweenGrade - if there isn't grades in the range that you specified

JSON response examples:
{ gradeByRange: [ "John", "Anna" ] }
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
